verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
It is a good thing to give thanks unto the LORD
It is a good thing to give thanks unto the LORD
And to sing praises unto Your name
O Most High

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
To declare Thy lovingkindness in the morning
And Thy faithfulness every night
It is a good thing to give thanks unto the LORD
And to sing praises unto Your name
O Most High
